    • Constructor Detail

      • Ghost

        public Ghost(int x,
             int y)
        Create a new Ghost with coordinates multiplied by "size".
        Parameters:
        x - the top x*size coordinate of the square containing the ghost
        y - the top y*size coordinate of the square containing the ghost
        Preconditions :
        x >= 0 && y >= 0

      • draw

        public void draw(boolean isEatable)
        Modify ghost color if it is eatable or not and move it
        Parameters:
        isEatable - boolean which is true if PacMan can eat them
